review: MY BROTHER GOT ONE AND TOLD ME THAT IF MY TV HAD AN HDMI PORT I SHOULD GET ONE TOO. SO I FINALLY DID AND IT WORKS GREAT. MY BROTHER SAYS HE CAN EVEN USE INTERNET EXPLORER ON HIS BUT I HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO DO THAT YET. I GOT THE ONE MONTH AMAZON PRIME AND AM CURRENTLY WATCH THE ORIGINAL STARGATE TV SERIES WHICH I CAN'T FIND ANYWHERE ELSE. I EVEN DOWNLOADED THE AMAZON FIRESTICK REMOTE APP TO USE INSTEAD OF THE REMOTE IT COMES WITH. ONCE YOU GET THE HANG OF IT, IT BECOMES EASIER TO NAVIGATE AND A KEYBOARD FOR TYPING INSTEAD OF ONE BY ONE SELECTION WITH THE TRADITIONAL REMOVE.

review: We have been looking to drop our cable package for a while, so I ordered the Fire Stick. Well I can't believe how easy the fire stick is to use! It came preloaded with my Amazon Prime account info, I set up Netflix in seconds, and was pleased to see all the other free TV services available on the device!Pros:Super Easy set-upPreloaded with Amazon PrimeCompatibility with IPhone/Android remote control Apps.Netflix works great and set up easyVery easy remote functionIt's HD!!Screensaver Built inComes with power cord and HDMI extensionCons:Opening the battery compartment (I nearly had to get a screwdriver to pry)I had no interest in games so I had to delete them off the fire stickOverall: I would buy again in a second because my cons could be pros depending on the user.Update: I have been having some issues with my signal dropping with the fire stick causing some frequent resets. I have also had some issues with sound loss after selecting a movie or show. I may end up exchanging. I still love the fire stick, but want it to work right
